subtitle.pictureUploadClarification: You can upload your logo here. Your picture will appear in the same square format to payers in the FLIZ app, for example in the transaction history. You can upload jpeg, jpg or png.

subtitle.paymentClarification: You receive your FLIZ payments on the IBAN you entered here

title.flizInstallation: FLIZ installation for your webshop checkout

subtitle.apiKeyClarification: Please generate your API key. Note that your API key is sensitive data. Save it in a secure location because once you leave this page, you will not have access to it again. Do not share it with anyone.

apiKeyModal.title: Are you sure you want to generate a new API Key?
apiKeyModal.subtitle: Please note, that with a new API Key, you need to update it wherever you use it, e.g. in your plugin.

subtitle.webhookClarification: Please provide your webhook URL so that we can notify you of payment statuses.
subtitle.webhookSecretClarification: Note that your Webhook Secret is sensitive data. Save it in a secure location because once you leave this page, you will not have access to it again. Do not share it with anyone.
subtitle.guideOnIntegration: You can find a guide on how to integrate FLIZ with your IT platform by following this link to our dedicated section.

button.docsRedirect: Go to integration docs / installation guides

webhookSecretModal.title: Are you sure you want to generate a new Webhook secret?
webhookSecretModal.subtitle: Please note, that with a new Webhook Secret, you need to implement the new Webhook Secret in your code.

title.wordPress: 2. Go to your WordPress admin page

subtitle.wordPressClarification: You can integrate FLIZ in just a few minutes on your WordPress admin page - you don't need any technical knowledge for this. Open your WordPress admin page in your browser.
subtitle.wordPressAdminPage: Forgot where to find your WordPress admin page? Apply the following logic: yourURL.com/wp-admin, for example, for Amazon it would be amazon.de/wp-admin
subtitle.downloadClarification: Once you've signed in to your WordPress admin page, please click on "Plugins" in the menu on the left and then click on "Add New Plugin" in the sub-menu. Now you can search for "FLIZpay" in the search bar at the top right of the screen. This will show the FLIZpay plugin, and you can click on "Install Now".
subtitle.activateClarification: Once the installation is complete, you can click on "Activate" where it previously said "Install Now". This will automatically take you to the installed plugins screen. (Alternatively, you can click on "Installed Plugins" in the menu on the left. Then, in the row for the FLIZpay plugin, you need to click on "Activate".) Once activated, click on "Settings" in the row of the FLIZpay plugin. Afterwards, please follow the instructions shown on the settings page and only return to your FLIZ account when prompted by the instructions in your WordPress admin page.
subtitle.makeItVisibleClarification: Make sure you save as many fees as possible with fee-free FLIZ. So, don't forget to put FLIZpay first in the list of payment methods presented to customers. You can do this on your WordPress admin page. In the left menu, click on "WooCommerce", then the sub-menu "Settings". Now click on the tab "Payments" in the menu at the top of the page. Here, you can drag and drop or use the arrows to adjust the position of FLIZpay in the list of available payment methods. When you are finished, go to the bottom left and click "Save changes".
subtitle.cashbackClarification: Change your customers' payment behavior to ensure they use fee-free payment method FLIZ. This way, customers support your bottom line and optimize their own finances at the same time. You can configure your cashback in the menu on the left or
subtitle.link: click here to define your cashback.
subtitle.logoClarification: Go to your 'Profile' and add your logo. If you don't add a logo, payments to you will be shown to your customers with an empty logo placeholder, for example in the FLIZ app.

subtitle.loginDetails: You can use your login details from this account to sign in to the FLIZpay app.
subtitle.qrcExplanation:
If you're selling in-person, you can use the FLIZpay app to accept payments in your store, at your market stand or anywhere else. With the FLIZpay app, you can generate QR-Codes with the value you'd like to receive, or you can use your ID QR-Code, which allows the payer to choose the amount. With the FLIZpay app, your phone turns into a payment terminal that has no fees.
Your customers only need to scan the QR code with their phone camera or with the FLIZpay app to pay you. Make sure that mobile phone reception is optimal in places where you want to get paid.
subtitle.linkExplanation: You have the option to generate payment links from the FLIZpay app. Your customers can click the payment link and pay with FLIZ. Again, you can choose the amounts or let your customers define the amount.
subtitle.downloadFliz:
You’ll find the app on
Google Play and the App
Store. Scan to download
the app.

subtitle.customerBehavior: Encourage customers to use FLIZ by offering percentage-based cashback as a discount on purchases made with FLIZ. Higher cashback increases FLIZ adoption, reducing your fees and benefiting customers financially. Once activated, the cashback applies automatically to all FLIZ purchases, with FLIZ displaying the offer to customers.
subtitle.firstPayment: Once a customer pays with FLIZ, they’re likely to stick with it, boosting your business value. Offer higher cashback incentives to new customers to encourage FLIZ payments. If you activate this cashback, it will only apply to the customer's first payment with FLIZ in your shop and will not be applied again afterwards.
subtitle.standardCashback: This cashback applies to all customers on every purchase after their first FLIZ payment in your shop.

message.activateFirstPayment: Please activate first payment cashback to proceed with standard cashback.

subtitle.qrcPaymentsExplanation: We enable you to generate QR-Codes that your customers can scan to pay you. You can either generate a QR-Code with a specific amount, or you can use your ID QR-Code, which allows your customers to choose the amount to pay. You can also use the FLIZpay phone app to generate QR-Codes, basically using your phone as a payment terminal (see menu).
subtitle.generateQrcExplanation: Here you can generate a QR-Code with a fixed amount and message. This QR-Code can be used for multiple payments and never expires.
subtitle.yourQrcExplanation: This QR-Code uniquely identifies your account and it will always be the same for your FLIZ account. When someone scans your QR-Code, they can quickly set an amount and add a message to pay you.

subtitle.linkExplanation: We enable you to generate payment links that your customers can click to pay you. You can either generate a payment link with a specific amount, or you can use your ID link, which allows your customers to choose the amount to pay.
subtitle.generationExplanation: Here you can generate a link with a fixed amount and message. This link can be used for multiple payments and it never expires. You can share this link with someone who needs to pay you.
subtitle.idLinkExplanation: This link uniquely identifies your account and it will always be the same for your FLIZ account. When someone uses your link, she/he can quickly set an amount and add a message to pay you. You can share this link with someone who needs to pay you.

editIban.title: Please enter the new account to receive FLIZ payments.

toast.success: Your IBAN has been updated successfully.

help.title: Help
help.subject: Help&body=Please describe your issue or question:

online.welcome: Welcome to FLIZpay, {name}! Let's kick off with a quick tutorial to help you onboard your business.
online.profile: Start by setting up your business profile with your logo — this will help customers identify you in the FLIZ app.
online.installation: Head to “Installation” and follow the instructions to integrate FLIZpay into your checkout page.
online.cashback: Once you're done, be sure to set up a cashback offer.

inPerson.welcome: Welcome to FLIZpay, {name}! Let's kick off with a quick tutorial to help you onboard your business.
inPerson.profile: Start by setting up your business profile with your logo — this will help customers identify you in the FLIZ app.
inPerson.app: Download our app and log in with your business account to accept payments in person.

Successes.ibanUpdateSuccessMessage: Your IBAN has been updated successfully.
Successes.passwordUpdateSuccessMessage: Your password has been updated successfully.

Errors.credentialsError: Your email or password is incorrect. Please try again.
Errors.emailVerificationError: Email is not verified. Please provide a verification code sent to your email or use the "Forgot your password?" flow.
Errors.entityRoleError: You are on the login page for businesses. You cannot use your personal account here. Create a business account to continue.
Errors.serverError: Something happened on our side. Please try again latter.
Errors.editBaseInfoError: Please make sure no field is empty.
Errors.editCompanyNameError: Please use only numbers and letters on company name.
